SCRIPT.MSCRI: !---------------------Logging Connection Details------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Server IP or DNS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TDM_BASE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TDM_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_TDM_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Common AE script to log Connection details parameters.
